items.title: Febreze Reveals Vanilla Suede as its 2025 Scent of the Year
items.description: CINCINNATI, April 09, 2025--Trade FOMO for JOMO with Febreze's fourth annual Scent of the Year, Vanilla Suede. Embrace the joy of missing out and the comfort of your own home with an enchanting scent experience that creates a sanctuary for homebodies and hostesses alike. From Febrezeâ€™s new Blends Collection, Vanilla Suede instantly transforms any night at home into a luxurious staycation.

items.title: Procter & Gamble: quarterly dividend up 5%
items.description: Procter & Gamble has announced that its Board of Directors has approved a 5% increase in its quarterly dividend to $1.0568 per share, to be paid from 15 May.The consumer staples group has paid a...
